original: 北海高密人，曹魏官員。經學大家鄭玄之孫。曾與司空鄭沖教導曹髦《尚書》。後因遭司馬師質疑私窺秘摺，而被賜鴆酒毒殺。或說乃司馬昭。
text: Beihai Gaomi, Cao Wei official. Grandson of Zheng Xuan, a great master of Confucian classics. Once taught Cao Mao's 'Shangshu' with Sagong Zheng Chong. After being questioned by Master Sima, he was poisoned with poison. Or it is Sima Zhao.
